wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Leslie Allen (22 April 1935 – 2006) was an English footballer who made 60 appearances in the Football League playing for Lincoln City. He played as a full back. Before joining Lincoln, he was on the books of Birmingham City for some years without playing for the first team, and his career ended because of a broken leg in December 1960.
